Martell Tricentenaire Garden at 3812 Gallery opens this Friday!
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=}},
The wait is over! We are proud to announce the renovation at 3812 Gallery has finally been completed. The Martell Tricentenaire Garden at 3812 Gallery will be open for the first time this coming Friday.
Be a part of this by-invitation-only event to appreciate the 300-bottle art installation by Chinese artist Liu Zhuoquan, while enjoying a complimentary glass of Martell.
Date & Time: 20 November - 4 December 2015 (Monday to Friday), 11:00am - 5:00pm
Location: G/F, 118 Queen's Road West, Sai Ying Pun, Hong Kong
Please RSVP below to reserve your place with us.
